CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( APT_Termination_Reasons__c )) ,NOT(ISBLANK(Termination_Date__c)) ,NOT(ISBLANK(Termination_Comments__c )) ,NOT(ISPICKVAL(APT_Customer_Initiated_Termination__c,"")) ,ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Effect") ,NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Being Amended")) ,NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Being Renewed")) ,NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Being Terminated")) ) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementTerminationInitiate?id=" & Id , IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_InitiateTermination" , "Initiate Termination") ,"_self") , NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please populate the following fields for the button to appear: Customer Initiated Termination? Termination Reasons Termination Comments Termination Date
CustomField.label: Initiate Contract Termination
